# Austin Spraggins | Co-Founder & CTO | Senior Software Engineer

> Co-Founder, CTO & Senior Software Engineer at LineCrush Inc. 2+ years building production systems at scale. Christian. Father of Julian and Lilly. Open to contracts & consulting.

## About

Austin Spraggins is a full-stack engineer and technical leader based in Fresno, California. He co-founded LineCrush Inc, a sports analytics platform, where he serves as CTO overseeing the entire technical stack.

**Mission:** To serve God, be a good father and provider, and build technology that makes the world more intelligent, loving, and just.

### Technical Expertise

- **Frontend:** Next.js 15, React (353+ components), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend:** Python (45+ microservices), Node.js, 45+ API endpoints
- **Database:** PostgreSQL/Neon (100+ tables), Redis caching
- **AI/ML:** 4+ LLM integrations (OpenAI, Anthropic, Perplexity, Google Vision)
- **Infrastructure:** AWS (S3, SES, CloudFront), Ubuntu VPS, Vercel, Docker

### Background

Father of two wonderful children - Julian and Lilly. Former truck driver who transitioned to tech. Former Web Development instructor at Bitwise Industries and Geekwise Academy. AA in Web Development with 5+ years of college education. Grew up in the mountains of O'Neals, California.

## Projects

- [LineCrush](https://www.linecrush.com): Sports analytics platform - 353+ React components, 45+ Python microservices, 100+ database tables, 4+ LLM integrations
- [SaveALife CPR](https://github.com/spragginsdesigns/savealife-cpr): Emergency response training application
- [Bible AI Explorer](https://github.com/spragginsdesigns/bible-ai-explorer): AI-powered Bible study assistant
- [AI Tutor WebApp](https://github.com/spragginsdesigns/ai-tutor-webapp): Educational AI tutoring platform
